title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Enter a valid email address and a strong password.
Submit the registration form.
Check that the registration is successful and a verification email is sent.

title: User Login Success
description: Verify user can log in with correct email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input registered email and correct password.
Click on login button.
User is logged in successfully and redirected to dashboard.

title: User Login Failure With Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login failure when invalid email or password is used.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter invalid or unregistered email and/or incorrect password.
Attempt to log in.
Ensure error message is displayed, and login is denied.

title: Password Reset Workflow
description: Verify password reset can be initiated and completed successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to password reset page.
Enter registered email address and submit reset request.
Check that password reset email is sent.
Follow the password reset link and set a new password.
Verify user can log in with the new password.

title: Catalog Creation with Template Selection
description: Verify that user can create a new catalog by selecting a template.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to Catalogs page.
Click 'New Catalog' button.
Select a catalog template from available options.
Confirm creation of the catalog.
Catalog is created and accessible for editing.

title: Drag-and-Drop Catalog Builder Functionality
description: Verify that users can add and arrange products and layout elements using drag-and-drop in real-time.

steps.description: Open an existing catalog in the catalog builder/editor.
Drag product elements onto pages and rearrange layout blocks.
Changes reflect immediately in the catalog preview.
Save the catalog.
Verify persisted changes by reloading the catalog.

title: Product CRUD Operations - Create
description: Verify creating a new product with required and optional fields including image upload.

steps.description: Navigate to the product management page.
Initiate new product creation.
Fill product name, SKU, price, stock, category, and custom attributes.
Upload product image and complete creation.
Verify product is listed with correct details and optimized image URL.

title: Product CRUD Operations - Update
description: Verify updating existing product details including image replacement.

steps.description: Select a product to edit.
Modify product information fields and replace image.
Save the product.
Verify updated details and new image appear correctly.

title: Product CRUD Operations - Delete
description: Verify product can be deleted and removed from product list and catalog.

steps.description: Select a product for deletion.
Confirm deletion action.
Verify product is removed from product list and any catalogs where it was used.

title: Bulk Product Import via Excel/CSV
description: Verify bulk import of products from well-formed Excel/CSV files including mandatory validations.

steps.description: Navigate to product import feature.
Upload a valid Excel or CSV file with multiple product entries.
All valid products are imported and listed with correct details.
Invalid or incomplete entries are flagged and not imported.

title: Bulk Product Export to Excel/CSV
description: Verify ability to export all products to Excel/CSV format correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to product export feature.
Request export of all products.
Excel/CSV file is generated containing accurate product data matching the current catalog.

title: Image Upload and Optimization via Cloudinary
description: Verify product image uploads succeed, optimized WebP/AVIF URLs are returned and accessible.

steps.description: Upload product images through the Cloudinary integration.
Ensure images are uploaded successfully and optimization formats are applied.
Verify that returned image URLs are accessible and images display correctly in the app.

title: Catalog Publishing and Shareable URL/QR Code Generation
description: Verify catalog publishing generates a unique slug, shareable URL, and QR code.

steps.description: Publish a completed catalog.
Check that a unique slug is generated and appended to public URL.
Verify QR code corresponds to the unique catalog URL.

title: Public Catalog Viewing with Interactive Page-Flip Animations
description: Verify that the public catalog viewer loads correctly with page-flip animations and interactive product elements.

steps.description: Access the published catalog URL as a public user.
Ensure page-flip animations work smoothly.
Validate that all interactive product details (e.g., product info popups) function correctly.

title: Multi-language Support in Editor and Public View
description: Verify that Turkish and English translations appear correctly in the catalog editor and public catalog views.

steps.description: Switch language between Turkish and English in the catalog editor.
All UI text and catalog content reflect the selected language.
Publish the catalog and access the public view, switching language as applicable.
Ensure all catalog elements and interface text are localized correctly.

title: High-Quality PDF Export of Catalogs
description: Verify that exporting a catalog to PDF preserves layout, images, and product details without errors.

steps.description: Open a completed catalog in the editor.
Use the export feature to generate a PDF version.
Download and open PDF to validate layout, images, text, and product details are correct.

title: Subscription Plan Limits Enforcement
description: Verify that the system enforces catalog and product limits per subscription plan and prompts upgrade modal when limits are reached.

steps.description: Log in with an account on a Free or Plus subscription plan.
Create catalogs and add products until plan limits are reached.
Verify that attempts to exceed limits are blocked and upgrade modal is shown.
Open subscription management UI and verify plan details and upgrade options.
Check that manual payment upgrade workflow starts correctly when triggered.

title: Role-Based Access Control for Catalog and Product Management
description: Verify that users with different roles can or cannot access and perform CRUD operations according to permissions.

steps.description: Log in as a user with viewer-only role.
Attempt to create, edit, or delete catalogs and products.
Verify that unauthorized actions are blocked and appropriate error messages display.
Log in as an admin user.
Perform full CRUD operations on catalogs and products.
Verify all actions succeed with permissions.

title: Analytics Dashboard Accuracy and Data Tracking
description: Verify that catalog views, device types, and geographic metrics are tracked accurately and displayed correctly in the analytics dashboard.

steps.description: Access published catalogs from various devices and locations.
Open analytics dashboard in user account.
Check that view counts, device category breakdowns, and geographic data reflect recent activity accurately.

title: Input Validation on Product Fields
description: Verify that mandatory fields such as name and price are validated during product creation and editing, including boundary and invalid inputs.

steps.description: Attempt to create a product without a name.
Validation error prevents submission.
Attempt to input invalid price values such as negative numbers or non-numeric input.
Appropriate error messages displayed; submission blocked.
Test boundary conditions for stock quantity (0, very high values).
Verify valid inputs accepted and stored; invalid values rejected.

title: Catalog Editing Persistence
description: Verify that changes made in the catalog builder persist correctly and are reflected after reload.

steps.description: Make several edits in a catalog including layout changes and product details.
Save and close the editor.
Reopen the catalog editor.
Verify all changes remain intact and display accurately.

title: Error Handling for Failed Image Uploads
description: Verify proper error handling and user notification when image upload fails.

steps.description: Attempt to upload an invalid or corrupted image file.
Check that upload is rejected and an informative error message is shown.
Attempt to upload image when network is unavailable or server returns error.
Verify error is handled gracefully and user is informed without app crash.
